tool.name: DailyState

param.name: enable_eco_inactive_population_layer
param.displayname: Enable Economically inactive and Uemployed Population Layer
param.dialogReference: Checking this box will turn on the Economically inactive and Uemployed Population Layer and will be included in the calculation

param.name: eco_inactive_population_layer
param.displayname: Economically inactive and Uemployed Population (Point Layer)
param.dialogReference: Load the modified Point Feature Class "Budovy s číslem domu a vchody" from the Register of Census Districts and Buildings (Registr sčítacích obvodů a budov; abbreviated as RSO), or similar data source, which contains information on the economically inactive population and the unemployed.

param.name: eco_inactive_population_field
param.displayname: Number of Economically inactive and Uemployed Population (Field)
param.dialogReference: Choose the Attribute (Field) that carries information about the number of economically inactive population and the unemployed.

param.name: enable_working_population_employees_layer
param.displayname: Enable Working Population and Employees Layer
param.dialogReference: Checking this box will turn on the Working Population and Employees Layer and will be included in the calculation

param.name: working_population_employees_layer
param.dialogReference: Load the Point Feature Class based on data from the Register of Economic Entities (originally Registr ekonomických subjektů; abbreviated as RES) or similar data source.

param.name: working_population_employees_field
param.displayname: Number of Working Population and Employees (Field)
param.dialogReference: Choose the Attribute (Field) that carries information about the number of working population and employees.

param.name: enable_children_students_layer
param.dialogReference: Checking this box will turn on the Children and Students Layer and will be included in the calculation

param.name: children_students_layer
param.dialogReference: Load the Point Feature Class based on occupancy data from the Reports on educational institutions of the Ministry of Education, Youth and Sports of the Czech Republic (e.g. Výkaz o základní škole M 3 and Výkaz o střední škole M 8) or similar data source.

param.name: children_students_field
param.displayname: Number of Children and Students in Educational Institutions (Field)
param.dialogReference: Choose the Attribute (Field) that carries information about the number of children in kindergartens and students in educational institutions.

param.name: enable_teachers_school_facilities_staff_layer
param.displayname: Enable Teachers and Educational Institutions Staff Layer
param.dialogReference: Checking this box will turn on the Teachers and Educational Institutions Staff Layer and will be included in the calculation

param.name: teachers_school_facilities_staff_layer
param.displayname: Teachers and Educational Institutions Staff (Point Layer)
param.dialogReference: Load the modified Point Feature Class "Budovy s číslem domu a vchody" from the Register of Census Districts and Buildings (Registr sčítacích obvodů a budov; abbreviated as RSO), or similar data source, which contains information on the number of educational institutions employees, such as teachers and operational staff.

param.name: teachers_school_facilities_staff_field
param.displayname: Number of Teachers and Educational Institutions Staff (Field)
param.dialogReference: Choose the Attribute (Field) that carries information about the number of teachers and staff in educational institutions.

param.name: enable_retirees_layer
param.dialogReference: Checking this box will turn on the Eldery Population Layer and will be included in the calculation

param.name: retirees_layer
param.dialogReference: Load the Point Feature Class based on data from the Register of Social Service Providers (Registr poskytovatelů sociálních služeb), or similar data source, which contains information about the capacities of residential facilities for the elderly.

param.name: retirees_field
param.dialogReference: Choose the Attribute (Field) that carries information about the number of eldery population (pensioners, retirees).

param.name: target_area_polygon
param.dialogReference: Load the Polygon Feature Class containing feature (or features) representing the target zone for which you want to perform aggregation. It can be taken from the Register of Territorial Identification, Addresses and Real Estate (Registr územní identifikace, adres a nemovitostí; RÚIAN).

param.name: enable_custom_grid_layer
param.dialogReference: By checking this box it will be possible to use a custom grid.

param.name: custom_grid_layer
param.dialogReference: Load the Polygon Feature Class representing the custom grid by/to which you want to perform aggregation.

param.name: grid_cell_size
param.dialogReference: Specify the Grid Cell Size in the appropriate spatial unit. One cell in the resulting grid will correspond to this specified size.

param.name: grid_shape_type
param.expression: Square | Triangle | Hexagon | Transverse Hexagon | Diamond
param.dialogReference: Specify the Shape of the Grid Cell.

param.name: spatial_reference
param.dialogReference:
Select the Spatial Reference that the tool will work with and that will be used for the generated outputs.

All input Feature Classes must conform to this Spatial Reference, which is also applied to the output grid (Output Name File).

param.name: output_workspace
param.dialogReference: Select the Working Environment (Output Geodatabase) that the tool will use to store the temporary data and to which the resulting outputs (Output Name File) will be saved.

param.name: output_type
param.dialogReference: Choose whether to save the output (Output Name File) as a Raster or a Vector.

param.name: output_name
param.dialogReference: Enter the name of the population grid Output File that this tool generates.

tool.summary:
A tool for generating of the Daily State variant of the population grid in raster or vector form based on user-defined criteria.

Daily Population Grid can be generated using the following data from national registers, either in their natural or modified form:

  • Register of Census Districts and Buildings (Registr sčítacích obvodů a budov, abbreviated as RSO);

  • Register of Economic Entities (Registr ekonomických subjektů, RES);

  • Reports on educational institutions of the Ministry of Education, Youth and Sports of the Czech Republic (e.g. Výkaz o základní škole M3, Výkaz o střední škole M8);

  • Register of Social Service Providers (Registr poskytovatelů sociálních služeb).

Target Area polygon can be taken from the Register of Territorial Identification, Addresses and Real Estate (Registr územní identifikace, adres a nemovitostí; RÚIAN).
